title: Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching between perspectives in the application, the maximized state of a view is lost.
OB: When I switch perspectives, the view that was previously maximized shrinks back to its default size.
EB: When I switch perspectives, the maximized state of the view should be preserved.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Maximize a view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the previously maximized view shrinks back to its default size.
